themes: lack of informed decision-making by city staff
key_phrases: an eye to community economic impact
city staff awarding the available funds need to be better informed
a bar (yes a bar serving alcoholic drinks) was given $80,000
the EAST art tour was only given $40,000
the EAST tour collapsed after 20 years
barriers_identified: uninformed funding decisions by city staff
solutions_proposed: ensure city staff are better informed when awarding funds
consider community economic impact in funding decisions
